chat.skip_phase_hint: :lit: &eYou can skip this onboarding phase with &6!tutorial skip&e.

chat.onDialogComplete: &a:check_mark: Paperwork ongoing! Please wait &6{delay}s&a while {npc} &aarranges your transfer to the State Hotel.
chat.onTimerStart: :lit:&e Please wait inside the arrival area until your transfer is complete.
chat.onTeleport: :airplane:&b Welcome to Gramados! Enjoy your stay at the State Hotel.
chat.onConfine: :lit:&e You still need to speak with {npc} &r&eto finish arrival before leaving.
chat.onWelcome: &b:sun: Welcome to Gramados! Please speak with {npc} &r&bto complete your arrival paperwork.
chat.onRepeat: :lit:&e You still need to speak with {npc} &r&eto continue your arrival process.
chat.onReward: :giftchest: {npc} &ahas provided you with a new bicycle and a wrench as your first vehicle!

chat.welcome: &b:sun: Welcome to the State Hotel! You have been assigned to room &6{room}&b. Please make your way there to settle in.
chat.register_room_init: &b:sun: To register this room as your your home, please run &6!setHome <name> &bin the chat. This will allow you to return here easily later.
chat.find_room_prompt: :lit: &eFind your assigned room &6{room}&e and enter it.
chat.room_entry: :key: &aWelcome! This is your room &6{room}&a. We'll issue some starter furniture in &6{delay}s&a
chat.stay_in_room: :door: &ePlease stay inside your room &6{room}&e while we prepare your starter furniture.
chat.furniture_granted: :giftchest: &aYou have been granted some new furniture for your room! you can make the space yours by arranging it as you like.
chat.sethome_prompt: :door: &ePlease register this room &6{room}&e as your home with &6!setHome <name>&e before leaving.
chat.sethome_success: &a:check_mark: You have successfully registered this room as your home! You can now use &6!home &ato teleport back here anytime. You can also run &6!myHomes &ato see all your registered homes.
chat.lost_moment_teleport: &cIt seems you're lost. Teleporting you back to the hotel fallback.
chat.lost_moment_warn: &b:sun: You feel disoriented. In &6{delay}s&b, you'll be moved. Be ready to use &6!home &bor &6!home <name> &bto return home.
chat.lost_moment_use_home: &b:sun: Here we are, lost in the middle of nowhere, where only ruins remain. Use &6!home &bor &6!home <name> &bto safely return to your home.
chat.confine_reminder: :door:&e Please stay inside the State Hotel until you find your room &6{room}&e.
chat.home_max: &7You already have the maximum number of homes (&e{max}&7). Skipping home registration.
chat.register_room_reminder: :lit: &eRegister this room &6{room}&e as your home with &6!setHome <name>&e.
chat.no_home_yet: &eIt looks like you don't have any home yet. Use &6!setHome <name> &ein your room first.
chat.home_far_try: &a:check_mark: You're far enough now. Try &6!home &aor &6!home <name> &ato teleport back to your home.
chat.home_far_reminder: :lit: &eYou're far enough now. Try &6!home &eor &6!home <name> &eto teleport back to your home.
chat.home_command_tuto_init_full: &b:sun: Since you own other regions in Gramados, we'll skip the state hotel room assignment. However, you still get to learn how to use homes. Let's get started!
chat.home_command_tuto_init: &b:sun: You have learned how to set your home. Now, try using &6!myHomes &band &6!home &bto manage your homes. Start by walking away from your room.
chat.home_open_myhomes: :lit: &eOpen &6!myHomes&e, then walk a few blocks away and try &6!home &eto return.
chat.home_tutorial_complete: &a:check_mark: You successfully used &6!home &aor &6!home <name> &ato return to your home!
chat.phase1_complete: &a:check_mark: You found your way back. Feels good to be home again!
chat.home_info_max: &bYou can view your homes anytime with &6!myHomes&b. By default you can set up to &6{max}&b homes.

chat.s1_received: &b:sun: You received &r:money:&e40g&b (2x 20g bills). Please run &6!myMoney &bto see your pouch and inventory monetary breakdown.
chat.s1_completion: &a:check_mark: You now know how to open your Money Pouch! In &6{delay}s&a, we'll guide you on how to read through it!
chat.s2_guide_added: :page_facing_up: &aA detailed currency guide has been added to your inventory.
chat.s2_deposit_init: &b:sun: You can deposit money items from your inventory into your Money Pouch for safer keeping. You have to run &6!deposit &bwith money in hand to do so.
chat.s2_deposit_reminder: :lit: &eHold the money items in your hand and run &6!deposit &eto deposit them into your Money Pouch.
chat.s2_deposit_detected: &a:check_mark: You have successfully deposited money into your Money Pouch! Your pouch balance has increased.
chat.s2_deposit_failure_inv: :danger: &eIt looks like your inventory still contains your money. Please hold the money in your hand and run &6!deposit &ewith &6&lmoney in hand&r&e.
chat.s2_deposit_failure_generic: :danger: &eWe didn't detect any change in your pouch yet. Please try &6!deposit &ewith money in hand.
chat.s3_checkpouch_init: &b:sun: Now that you've deposited money into your pouch, it's time to confirm the update. Please run &6!myMoney &bagain to see your updated pouch balance.
chat.s3_checkpouch_reminder: :lit: &ePlease run &6!myMoney &eagain to confirm your pouch balance.
chat.s3_completed: &a:check_mark: You have successfully confirmed your Money Pouch update! Your pouch balance reflects the recent deposit.
chat.s3b_prompt: &b:sun: What a mess. You have several money items scattered in your inventory. To deposit them all at once, you can simply run &6!depositall &b, this will deposit all money items you have in your inventory into your Money Pouch.
chat.s3b_reminder: :lit: &eRun &6!depositall &eto deposit all money items from your inventory into your Money Pouch.
chat.s3b_completed: &a:check_mark: You have successfully deposited all money items from your inventory into your Money Pouch! Your pouch balance has increased.
chat.s4_validity_failure: :danger: &ePlease empty your inventory of all money items before proceeding with next steps. Use &6!depositall &eto deposit them into your Money Pouch.
chat.s4_withdraw_start: &b:sun: You can withdraw money from your Money Pouch into physical money items in your inventory. To do so, run &6!withdraw 6g &bwith the desired amount to withdraw.
chat.s4_withdraw_reminder: :lit: &ePlease run &6!withdraw 6g &eto withdraw the specified amount from your Money Pouch.
chat.s4_withdraw_completed: &a:check_mark: You have successfully withdrawn &r:money:&e6G &afrom your Money Pouch! Check your inventory, it has been updated with the physical money items. It should have a &r:money:&e5G &abill and a &r:money:&e1G &acoin.
chat.s4_redeposit_start: &b:sun: Now that you've withdrawn money from your pouch, try depositing it back in. Either by holding the money items in your hand and running &6!deposit &bor by running &6!depositall &bto deposit all money items from your inventory.
chat.s4_redeposit_reminder: :lit: &ePlease run &6!deposit &eor &6!depositall &eto deposit all your money items back into your Money Pouch.
chat.s4_redeposit_failure: :danger: &eYou still have money items in your inventory. Please run &6!deposit &eor &6!depositall &eagain until you have no more money items on you.
chat.s4_redeposit_completed: &a:check_mark: You have successfully deposited your money items back into your Money Pouch! Your pouch balance has increased.
chat.s4_multi_start: &b:sun: Let's say you need to withdraw &66&b coins of &r:money:&e1G &b, and not just &r:money:&e6G &bin total. You can do this by running &6!withdraw 1g 6 &bto withdraw &66&b coins of &r:money:&e1G &b!
chat.s4_multi_reminder: :lit: &ePlease run &6!withdraw 1g 6 &eto withdraw &66&e coins of &r:money:&e1G &efrom your Money Pouch.
chat.s4_multi_failure_wrong: :danger: &eThat is not what you were meant to run. Try again after depositing all.
chat.s4_multi_redeposit_hint: &eNow that you've deposited again, try &6!withdraw 1g 6 &eonce more.
chat.s4_multi_completed: &a:check_mark: You have successfully withdrawn &66&e coins of &r:money:&e1G &afrom your Money Pouch! Check your inventory, it has been updated with the physical money items. It should have &66&e coins of &r:money:&e1G &a.

chat: &b:sun: Here's a quick overview of the main currencies you will see:
&7  Event tokens obtained by participating in server events.
&7  Legacy token system for voting; currently deprecated and not supported.
&7  Purchased currency used for cosmetics and paid content.
&eMoney Pouch: &r:money: &r:danger:&c 50% of it will drop on death.
&7  A dematerialized balance representing money stored in your pouch. (In grons)
&eInventory: &r:money: &r:danger:&c 100% of it will drop on death.
&7  Physical currency items you carry in your inventory. (In grons)

entries.Arcade Tokens: Event tokens obtained by participating in server events. Usually exist as items and are not stored in your pouch.
entries.Vote Tokens: Legacy token system for voting; currently deprecated and not supported. You can safely ignore these.
entries.Shop Tokens: Purchased currency used for cosmetics and paid content. Managed separately from in-game money.
entries.Money Pouch: A dematerialized balance representing money stored in your pouch (displayed by !myMoney). Note: keeping money on you may cause losses on death (50% when carried in pouch).
entries.Inventory: Physical money items in your inventory (bills/coins). These drop on death (100% dropped). Use !deposit to move them into your pouch.

chat.s5_canteen_start: &b:sun: It's time to make your first purchase! Head over to the &6State Hotel canteen, floor 1&b and take a look at the traders. You will see items available for purchase along with their prices.
chat.s5_canteen_reminder: :lit: &ePlease head over to the &6State Hotel canteen, floor 1&e to view the available items for purchase.
chat.s5_canteen_completed: &a:check_mark: Now that you are at the canteen, find a waiter and browse their items.
chat.s5_waiter_start: &b:sun: Inside the canteen, look for &6{npc}&b near the counter. Get close to speak with him.
chat.s5_waiter_reminder: :lit: &eFind &6{npc}&e inside the canteen and get within &63 blocks &eto continue.
chat.s5_waiter_confining: :door: &ePlease stay inside the canteen until you've found &6{npc}&e.
chat.s5_waiter_completed: &a:check_mark: You found &6{npc}&a. Let's take a look at what he's offering.
chat.s5_purchase_start: &b:sun: Now that you've found the waiter, choose any food item from his menu and buy it using your money. Use &6!myMoney &bto check your balance, and &6!withdraw <amount> &bif needed.
chat.s5_purchase_reminder: :lit: &ePlease choose a food item from the waiter's menu to purchase.
chat.s5_purchase_far_reminder: :lit: &eYou're too far from &6{npc}&e. Please return to continue your purchase.
chat.s5_purchase_confining: :door: &ePlease stay inside the canteen area until you complete your purchase.
chat.s5_purchase_completed: &a:check_mark: Congratulations on making your first purchase! Enjoy your meal.

chat.inventory_free_slots_reminder: :lit: &ePlease ensure you have at least &6{slots}&e free inventory slots to move on with your onboarding.
chat.start: &b:sun: You have been given a collection of scrap materials. You will want to sell them to earn some money. In &6{delay}s &b, you will recieve a crate.
chat.completion: &a:check_mark: You have received a crate to pack your scrap materials.

chat.start: &b:sun: The crate that you received, like any other crates from jobs, can be placed on the ground and picked up again later. This can be done even in protected regions. So be aware that anyone can pick it up if you leave it unattended. Please place the crate on the ground to continue.
chat.reminder: :lit: &ePlease place the crate on the ground to continue.
chat.failure: :danger: &eIt seems like the crate was removed before you could proceed. Please make sure to place the crate on the ground and leave it there until you finish packing it.
chat.failure_reminder: :danger: &eWe still can't detect your crate. Place it on the ground and keep it there until you finish packing it.
chat.completion: &a:check_mark: You have placed the crate on the ground.

chat.start: &b:sun: Now that you have placed the crate, it's time to fill it with all the scrap items you received earlier. Please make sure to put all the scrap items into the crate to continue.
chat.reminder: :lit: &ePlease fill the crate with all your scrap items to continue.
chat.failure_missing_world: :danger: &eA required scrap item was removed from the crate. Please place it back: &6{items}&e.
chat.failure: :danger: &eYou need to fill the crate with all your scrap items before picking it up again. Please place the crate back down and add the remaining scrap items.
chat.failure_reminder: :danger: &eYou still have scrap items to add to the crate. Please place the crate back down and add the remaining scrap items.
chat.completion: &a:check_mark: You have successfully filled the crate with all your scrap items!

chat.start: &b:sun: Great job filling the crate! Now, please pick up the crate so you can move it with all its contents.
chat.reminder: :lit: &ePlease pick up the crate to continue.
chat.failure_missing_world: :danger: &eYou removed a required item from the crate. Please put it back: &6{items}&e.
chat.failure_missing_inventory: :danger: &eThe crate you picked up is missing required items: &6{items}&e. Place it down and put them back.
chat.failure: :danger: &eWe didn't detect the crate in your inventory. Place it back down and try again.
chat.failure_reminder: :danger: &eStill no crate detected in your inventory. Place it back down and pick it up again once it's correctly filled.
chat.completion: &a:check_mark: You have picked up the crate successfully! Crates can be kept in your inventory, and can also be placed in vehicles. If the vehicle is locked, the crate will remain safe inside.

chat.intro: &b:sun: Now that you have your crate filled with scrap materials, it's time to sell them! Your crate contains both ferrous and non-ferrous scrap, which need to be sold at different facilities. Please head over to the &6{facility_ferrous} &bto sell some of your scrap materials.
chat.journeymap_hint: :map: &6{facility_ferrous} &7is located at the North-East of Gramados City, near the junkyard. Click here to open it in your Minimap:
chat.reminder: :lit: &ePlease head over to the &6{facility_ferrous} &eto sell your ferrous scrap materials.

chat.start: &b:sun: Now that you are at the &6{facility_ferrous} &bfacility, you are able to sell ferrous scrap materials from your crate. Find the trader and right-click him while holding the crate. He will automatically take what he needs from the crate and pay you accordingly.
chat.reminder: :lit: &ePlease find the trader and right-click him while holding the crate.
chat.failure: :danger: &eYou need to keep the crate with you until you reach the selling facility. Please head over to &6{facility_ferrous}&e while keeping the crate in your inventory.
chat.completion: &a:check_mark: You have successfully sold the ferrous scrap materials from your crate! But the crate is not empty yet.

chat.intro: &b:sun: Now that you have sold the ferrous scrap materials, it's time to sell the remaining non-ferrous scrap from your crate. Please head over to the &6{facility_nonferrous} &bto sell your non-ferrous scrap materials.
chat.journeymap_hint: :map: &6{facility_nonferrous} &7is located at the South-West of Gramados City, near the industrial area. Click here to open it in your Minimap:
chat.reminder: :lit: &ePlease head over to the &6{facility_nonferrous} &eto sell your non-ferrous scrap materials.

chat.start: &b:sun: Now that you are at the &6{facility_nonferrous} &bfacility, sell the remaining non-ferrous scrap from your crate. Find the trader and right-click them while holding the crate.
chat.reminder: :lit: &ePlease find the trader and right-click them while holding the crate to start the trade.
chat.failure: :danger: &eYou need to keep the crate with you until you reach the selling facility. Please head over to &6{facility_nonferrous}&e while keeping the crate in your inventory.
chat.completion: &a:check_mark: You have successfully sold the non-ferrous scrap materials from your crate!
chat.phase_completion: &b:star: You have completed the Scrap for a Start tutorial! You have learned how to pack, deliver, and sell goods using the crate system.
